messages.message:
:sheep:

When configuring "things" (in this case, a deployment) with connected drives/inboxes/other datasources, it may be helpful to see drives flagged/labeled as available from either the workspace or organization level.

For example, the first drive in the screenshot is a workspace-specific drive & the second is a drive available to the entire org. With potentially many drives in a production solution listed, it could help to differentiate workspace v. org at a glance via labels.
